content: earth amigurumi crocheted globe pattern helps make a great educational toy or cat toy this is a written pattern color-coded for ease and photo tutorial all continents are represented i really like how you colour-coded everything that was so very helpful especially for a first-timer my son took his with him to school and he was so proud -kyla marie come see my site for more free patterns gratefully~ celina lane simplycollectiblecrochet com 1 1 http //simplycollectiblecrochet com
